contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Homecoming | Type = Album | Artist = [[Gateway (band)|Gateway]] | Cover = Homecoming (Gateway album).jpg | Released = 1995 | Recorded = December 1994 | Genre = [[Jazz]] | Length = 73:13 | Label = [[ECM Records|ECM]] | Producer = [[Manfred Eicher]] | Chronology = | Last album = ''[[Gateway 2]]''<br />(1978)| | This album = '''''Homecoming'''''<br />(1995) | Next album = ''[[In the Moment (album)|In the Moment]]''<br />(1996)| }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1score = {{rating|3|5}}<ref>[http://www.allmusic.com/album/r224434 Allmusic Review]</ref> }}<!-- Automatically generated by DASHBot--> '''''Homecoming''''' is an album by [[Gateway (band)|Gateway]], a trio composed of [[John Abercrombie (guitarist)|John Abercrombie]], [[Dave Holland]] and [[Jack DeJohnette]]. It was recorded in 1994 and released on the [[ECM Records|ECM]] label in 1995 and is the trio's first album since ''[[Gateway 2]]'' in 1978. The [[Allmusic]] review by Greg Turner states "The Gateway Trio is a cooperative in the greatest sense of the word... Even though this only the third Gateway recording and the group's first in 17 years, each group member collaborates frequently with the others. As a result there is always a great sense of interplay between Abercrombie's sometimes-mellow-sometimes-distorted guitar, Holland's huge toned bass, and DeJohnette's dancing drums... This is a fine return to recording for a great group".<ref>Turner, G. [{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r224434|pure_url=yes}} Allmusic Review] accessed 11 September 2009</ref> ==Track listing== # "Homecoming" (Dave Holland) - 12:37 # "Waltz New" (John Abercrombie) - 8:32 # "Modern Times" (Holland) - 7:31 # "Calypso Falto" (Abercrombie) - 7:46 # "Short Cut" (Abercrombie) - 6:12 # "How's Never" (Holland) - 7:34 # "In Your Arms" (Holland) - 5:48 # "7th D" (Jack DeJohnette) - 9:30 # "Oneness" (DeJohnette) - 7:43 ==Personnel== *[[John Abercrombie (guitarist)|John Abercrombie]]: [[guitar]] *[[Jack DeJohnette]]: [[drum kit|drums]], [[piano]] *[[Dave Holland]]: [[double bass|bass]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:1995 albums]] [[Category:Gateway (band) albums]] [[Category:ECM Records albums]] [[Category:Albums produced by Manfred Eicher]]
